title: Gooner0
author: Gooner0
content: >> so many people prefer investing in shitcoins just because it offers higher growth potential than Bitcoin.What they fail to understand is that , investing in altcoins carries a lot of risk and you need thorough research before making investments decisions, if you've taken the decision to invest in Altcoins then get ready for potential looses.   I'll also advice you never use your all to invest!Bitcoins advantages makes it a reliable store of value and medium of exchange. The price of Bitcoin has really swept people off their feet, I mean imagine if maybe ten years ago you had a good amount of Bitcoin and you decide to hodl .Imagine how you'd be now!So the best thing is to use the DCA investment strategy in Bitcoin rather than investing in all this shitcoins.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Bitcoin is the most conservative investment among cryptocurrencies and should correspond to the largest portion of an investor's bankroll. Everything else (altcoins) is high risk gambling. Since the beginning of this industry we have been seeing Bitcoin performing on the top position of this market, while altcoins are constantly going upside and down each new cycle.The only exception is Ethereum. Every other altcoins don't give you any realistic assurance to maintain their position on the following years. The point is that they promise high financial returns, which is something Bitcoin doesn't at the current stage it has reached. So investors go for the altcoins instead, expecting to make 100% or even 1000% profit by holding shitcoins, personified in the figure of memecoins which are quite popular right now.It's ok to play with altcoins, though, since you respect your limits and don't compromise a large percentage of your funds on it.

comments.author: Odusko
comments.body: The problem with those that believe so much in shitcoins is that, the believe that Bitcoin is too expensive and can get them rich quick, that is why they look for shitcoins that promises them billions of dollars return in 24 hour's from a hundred dollars investment, not knowing that cryptocurrency is full of so many risk and hidden conditions that can and may not be publicly stated by this project team's, and also most of those coins are just following the hype's just to cash in on potential victims without any real intentions for the project.A lot of those that have lost money in crypto are greedy forks that just want to jump on any bandwagon that is available and promising them 10x return with a short period of time, but at the end also we have to recognize the fact that shitcoins or altcoins a re just for speculations and gambling on there price and market is the highest and the best approach to them, but those newbies gullible investors who buy those shitcoins may not have that knowledge, to know how best to approach those shitcoins, and they take the shitcoins a d real investment and putting they money into them without even realizing or analyzing the risks involved.

It's just that in this case what distinguishes bitcoin and altcoin is a certainty where the risk when in bitcoin will be much smaller than we are in altcoin.QuoteI'll also advice you never use your all to invest!Of course this should be done and everyone should be aware of something like this because it would be ridiculous if they do (sacrifice) everything for the investment that we do.Although investment is good, we must realize that in the end when we want to do it, we need a good strategy and planning which of course refers to the financial management that we have.Do not let us be aggressive by risking everything just because we want to get a big profit because we need to think about the life we live today and not only focus on the future.There are expenses that we have to think about for life now so don't push yourself too much because the concept of being in my version of bitcoin is that when we invest in bitcoin then we must also be prepared to lose which of course this will be difficult for us to accept when we risk everything for bitcoin even though it is profitable for the future but we cannot torture ourselves for the life we live now.

comments.author: nelson4lov
comments.body: The reality that most new folks coming into crypto right now are becoming to realize is that given the current price of Bitcoin, it would be nearly to get anything more than a 10x increase in its price in the foreseeable future. There won't be anything close to the gain that people that got in on bitcoin sub $1K currently enjoy — so it's normal to see people take their chances with these altcoins because unlike bitcoin, it doesn't take much to swing the price upwards. That's the reality right.For me, People kind of appeals to people with bigger capital size. Yesterday, a thought leader in Bitcoin shared a reddit post about a guy being excited about hitting the 0.1BTC mark after buying and DCAing for years. He noted that with each increase in the price, it becomes harder to acquire more bitcoin. Before being a wholecoiner was the goal. Now, there are people that see 0.1 BTC as the standard.

Some of them are willing to take the risk of gaining big or losing big. Many investors are not patient enough to hodl Bitcoin for a long time, so they prefer to gamble with some shitcoins in a bid to get short term profit. My advice to people, mostly newbies, is to invest only in Bitcoin because it has proved to be a reliable investment asset. Venturing into other coins should be done after studying the market and gaining the required knowledge. And if you want to diversify your crypto assets, consider buying only reputable altcoins.

comments.author: mirakal
comments.body: It’s not actually wrong to invest in altcoins with an amount that you can afford to lose. The problem is there’s a lot of altcoins are there that turn into shitcoins and now it’s hard to identify whether you invested in the right or wrong altcoins. Now, in order to lessen the risk from losing all your funds, stick to bitcoin instead. Don’t be bothered with bitcoin price since you’re not going to buy the whole bitcoin but just a small portion first from your spare money. Invest in bitcoin and hold, you will certainly not lose if you are patient enough to manage your coins and won’t sell when others are panicking to sell.

During dips, you might see how the value of your coins fluctuates and drops significantly especially when you bought at a higher price. But someone who already knows about this would have nothing to worry about since when the market goes up significantly you will gain alot of profis. Altcoins Carries more risks than Bitcoin. One needs to do deep research before stepping into such properties. The use value of Bitcoin, both as a store of value and medium of exchange, has been extremely stable, and its long-term growth potential substantial. Other techniques, such as DCA, may help in mitigating the risk associated and aid in building a long-term sustainable investment. You should not be risking your entire wealth in some aggressive investments; therefore, the right balance in your portfolio is necessary.

comments.author: fuguebtc
comments.body: I agree with you that bitcoin is the safest in the crypto market. But for me, I don't like being conservative and opinionated so I have no problem investing in altcoins. As long as we know what we are doing and are brave enough to take responsibility for our decisions, we can invest anywhere we think has potential. Although it cannot be denied that the altcoin market is full of scams, we also need to admit that there are also many altcoins that have also brought huge profits to many people. ETH, BNB, SOL...and many alts have also brought early investors thousands and millions of percent profits not inferior to bitcoin. We should not deny those things.Most altcoins are junk and risky but not all, there are still many altcoins that are generating profits that anyone craves. Of course, I'm only talking about profits, but in terms of technology or use cases, we just need bitcoin.
